Articles.Content: 1166: The entire floor is on fire. You quickly ascend to the next floor

1167:

Something bad happened here.

You run to the next floor.

1168:

You see an interview between the queen and gandi. You wake up on floor 1169.
1169: You find a drunk band of Kerbals. You make your escape.
1170: It's a giant safe full of LV-909 Engines.
1171: Trainz Simulator 12
1172: There's a flickering light at the other side of the room and the smell of diesel is prominent.
1173: The dolphin with a human head watches you as you go up the esculator.
1174: Sanic hedgehog is coming for you!

1175

you our see jeb accepting a 100000000Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â£Ã‚Â¥$ dollar contract

you go up to the next floor after congratulating him

1176

an empty room... You go to the window and look out just in time to watch a Chinese rocket zip by.
1177: You step into a vast primordial KSP simulation and almost get spaghettified by the Kraken.
1178: A Mainsail is being tested. Don't get caught in that fire!
1179: You see a kerbal fly past your window...
1180: You see an elevator. You, however, refuse to use it.
1181: You find out that the entire building is an elevator. You feel defeated.
1182: An airlock. You can see a Buran and MIR outside.
1183 you see the future and the past all jumbled into one image so you don't really see anything moving on

1184: The room seems very familiar, with a huge stairway leading up, and a door on the north wall. You open it to see that you are back on the ground, and you look up to see the tower continuing upward, towards the sky, and it is posted into another Kerbin! You see with a telescope someone who looks very familiar to you looking through a telescope at you. The sky suddenly comes crashing down and you discover that you are in a giant blank room painted to look like Kerbin, with the ceiling being a giant mirror. You go back out into the main room and look out the window, seeing that you are still kilometers above the ground. You continue up...

1185: The room doesn't look like the first floor, as it has a floating pad that raises you up to the next floor. What kind of trick was the 1184th floor?
1186: You realize that this floor has no walls or supports, making it architecturally impossible; confused, you continue up.

1187: You feel the ground shaking as the tower tips over, the rooms tilting and wobbling until the entire tower is on its side. THIS IS NOW THE WORLDS LONGEST HALLWAY. The next room... Has a button. Nothing else.

1188: The button is a simple, red button on a pedestal. You push it out of curiosity. THE ENTIRE BUILDING TIPS BACK UP. Launching you against the wall until the floor is the wall, and you continue up the rope ladder that has convenientely appeared against the wall.
1189: the ROAD TO FLOOR 1337! encounters a Prof. endwalker being arrested for posting tow rooms at once.

1190: You step out of a door, and immediately a bullet lands next to your feet. You are in Stalingrad during October 1942. You run as quickly as possible to the other end of the city, not stopping to ponder how a city fits in a single floor, and rush up the stairs just as a shell lands behind you.
1191: There was a rocket here, but shrapnel from the shell (See above) damaged it.
1192: You find out you forgot something very important 592 floors behind.
